abstract: McNeil Consumer Healthcare, which is under investigation by a House panel, said some lots of Benadryl and Tylenol were “inadvertently omitted” from an earlier recall.
snippet: McNeil Consumer Healthcare, which is under investigation by a House panel, said some lots of Benadryl and Tylenol were “inadvertently omitted” from an earlier recall.
lead_paragraph: The Johnson & Johnson unit whose recall of liquid children’s Tylenol and other pediatric medicines is under Congressional investigation said on Tuesday evening that it was recalling additional over-the-counter drugs.

headline.main: J.&J. Unit Under Scrutiny Recalls Additional Over-the-Counter Drugs
headline.print_headline: J.&J. Unit Under Scrutiny Recalls Additional Over-the-Counter Drugs
